
<script id="not_logged_in" type="text/html">
<!--
    Description: Login page
    src: templates/auth/login.html
-->

<div id="splashdiv">
    <h3 data-i18n="Log In">Log In</h3>
	<form href="#">
		<div class="clearfix">
			<% if (has('error_msg')) { %>
				<div class="alert alert-block alert-error fade in">
					<a class="close" data-dismiss="alert">&times;</a>
					<p><strong><%= get('error_msg') %></p>
				</div>
			<% } %>
			<fieldset>
				<div class="clearfix">
					<input class="input-login" type="text" name="username" maxlength="20" placeholder="User Name" />
				</div>
				<div class="clearfix">
					<input class="input-login" id="id_password" type="password"  name="password" maxlength="20" placeholder="Password" />
				</div>
			</fieldset>
			<button id="home_loginbtn" class="btn btn-blue pull-right credentials" data-i18n="Sign In">Sign In</button>
		</div>
	</form>
</div>
</script><script id="updateInstanceFormTemplate" type="text/html">
<div id="update_instance" class="modal hide ">
    <!--
    Description: Update Instance Form
    src: templates/forms/updateInstance.html
    -->
    <div class="modal-header">
        <a id="close" href="#" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</a>
        <h3>Update Instance</h3>
    </div>
    <form id="update_instance_form" class="" action="#">
        <div class="modal-body clearfix">
            <div class="left">
                <fieldset>
                    <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                        <label for="id_instance">Instance</label>
                        <span class="help-block"></span>
                        <div class="input">
                            <input readonly="readonly" type="text" name="instance" value="<%= model.id %>" id="id_instance" />
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                        <label for="id_name">Name</label>
                        <span class="help-block"></span>
                        <div class="input">
                            <input type="text" name="name" value="<%= model.get('name') %>" id="id_name" />
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </fieldset>
            </div>
            <div class="right">
                <h3>Description:</h3>
                <p>
                    Update the name of your instance
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="modal-footer">
            <a id="updateBtn" class="btn btn-blue pull-right" data-dismiss="modal">Update Instance</a>
            <a id="cancelBtn" class="close btn seconday cancel close" data-dismiss="modal">Cancel</a>
            <!--<a id="cancelBtn" class="btn secondary cancel close">Cancel</a>-->
        </div>
    </form>
</div>
</script><script id="createFlavorFormTemplate" type="text/html">
<div id="create_flavor" class="modal hide ">
    <!--
    Description: Create Flavor Form
    src: templates/forms/createFlavor.html
    -->
    <div class="modal-header">
        <a id="close" href="#" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</a>
        <h3>Create Flavor</h3>
    </div>
    <div class="modal-body clearfix">
        <div class="left">
            <fieldset>
                <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                    <label for="id_flavor_id">Flavor ID</label>
                    <span class="help-block"></span>
                    <div class="input">
                        <input type="number" name="flavor_id" id="id_flavor_id" required placeholder="Enter a whole number."/>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                    <label for="id_name">Name</label>
                    <span class="help-block"></span>
                    <div class="input">
                        <input id="id_name" type="text" name="name" maxlength="25" required placeholder="This field is required."/>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                    <label for="id_vcpus">VCPUs</label>
                    <span class="help-block"></span>
                    <div class="input">
                        <input id="id_vcpus" type="number" name="vcpus" maxlength="5" required placeholder="Enter a whole number."/>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                    <label for="id_memory_mb">Memory MB</label>
                    <span class="help-block"></span>
                    <div class="input">
                        <input id="id_memory_mb" type="number" name="memory_mb" maxlength="5" required placeholder="Enter a whole number."/>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                    <label for="id_disk_gb">Root Disk GB</label>
                    <span class="help-block"></span>
                    <div class="input">
                        <input id="id_disk_gb" type="number" name="disk_gb" maxlength="5" required placeholder="Enter a whole number."/>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                    <label for="id_eph_gb">Ephemeral Disk GB</label>
                    <span class="help-block"></span>
                    <div class="input">
                        <input id="id_eph_gb" type="number" name="eph_gb" maxlength="5" required placeholder="Enter a whole number."/>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </fieldset>
        </div>
        <div class="right">
            <h3>Description:</h3>
            <p>
                From here you can define the sizing of a new flavor.
            </p>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="modal-footer">
        <button id="submit" class="btn btn-blue pull-right" data-dismiss="modal">
            Create Flavor
        </button>
        <a href="#syspanel/flavors/" id="cancelBtn" class="btn secondary cancel close">Cancel</a>
    </div>
</div>
</script>

<script id="updateImageFormTemplate" type="text/html">
<div id="update_image" class="modal hide ">
    <!--
    Description: Update Image Form
    src: templates/forms/updateImage.html
    -->
    <div class="modal-header">
        <a id="close" href="#" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</a>
        <h3>Update Image</h3>
    </div>
    <form id="update_image_form" class="" action="#">
        <div class="modal-body clearfix">
            <div class="left">
                <fieldset>
                    <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                        <label for="id_name">Name</label>
                        <span class="help-block"></span>
                        <div class="input">
                            <input id="id_name" type="text" name="name" value="<%= model.get('name') %>" maxlength="25">
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                        <label for="id_kernel">Kernel ID</label>
                        <span class="help-block"></span>
                        <div class="input">
                            <input id="id_kernel" readonly="readonly" type="text" name="kernel" maxlength="36">
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                        <label for="id_ramdisk">Ramdisk ID</label>
                        <span class="help-block"></span>
                        <div class="input">
                            <input id="id_ramdisk" readonly="readonly" type="text" name="ramdisk" maxlength="36">
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                        <label for="id_architecture">Architecture</label>
                        <span class="help-block"></span>
                        <div class="input">
                            <input readonly="readonly" type="text" name="architecture" id="id_architecture">
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                        <label for="id_container_format">Container Format</label>
                        <span class="help-block"></span>
                        <div class="input">
                            <input readonly="readonly" type="text" name="container_format" value="ari" id="id_container_format">
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                        <label for="id_disk_format">Disk Format</label>
                        <span class="help-block"></span>
                        <div class="input">
                            <input readonly="readonly" type="text" name="disk_format" value="ari" id="id_disk_format">
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </fieldset>
            </div>
            <div class="right">
                <h3>Description:</h3>
                <p>
                    From here you can modify different properties of an image.
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="modal-footer">
            <input id="image_update" class="btn btn-blue pull-right" type="submit" value="Update Image">
            <a id="cancelBtn" class="btn secondary cancel close">Cancel</a>
        </div>
    </form>
</div>

<script id="changePasswordFormTemplate" type="text/html">
<div id="change_password" class="modal hide ">
    <!--
    Description: Change Password Form
    src: templates/forms/changePassword.html
    -->
    <div class="modal-header">
        <a id="close" href="#" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</a>
        <h3>Change Password</h3>
    </div>
    <div class="modal-body clearfix">
        <div class="left">
            <fieldset>
                <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                    <label for="id_instance">Instance</label>
                    <span class="help-block"></span>
                    <div class="input">
                        <input readonly="readonly" type="text" name="instance" value="<%= model.id %>" id="id_instance" />
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                    <label for="id_password">Password</label>
                    <span class="help-block"></span>
                    <div class="input">
                        <input type="password" name="instance_password" value="" id="id_password" />
                    </div>
                </div>
            </fieldset>
        </div>
        <div class="right">
            <h3>Description:</h3>
            <p>
                Update the password of your instance
            </p>
        </div>
    </div>

</script><script id="createKeyPairFormTemplate" type="text/html">
<div id="create_keypair" class="modal hide  in" style="display: block; ">
    <!--
    Description: Create Keypair Form
    src: templates/forms/createKeyPair.html
    -->
    <div class="modal-header">
        <a href="#" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">×</a>
        <h3>Create Keypair</h3>
    </div>

    <form id="create_keypair_form" class="" action="" method="">
        <div class="modal-body clearfix">

            <div class="left">
                <fieldset>

                    <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                        <label for="id_name">Keypair Name</label>

                        <span class="help-block" style="display: none; "></span>
                        <div class="input">
                            <input id="id_name" type="text" name="name" maxlength="20">
                        </div>
                    </div>

                </fieldset>
            </div>
            <div class="right">
                <h3>Description:</h3>
                <p>
                    Keypairs are ssh credentials which are injected into images when they are launched. Creating a new key pair registers the public key and downloads the private key (a .pem file).
                </p>
                <p>
                    Protect and use the key as you would any normal ssh private key.
                </p>
            </div>

        </div>
        <div class="modal-footer">
            <input class="btn btn-blue pull-right" type="submit" value="Create Keypair">
            <a href="/nova/access_and_security/" class="btn secondary cancel close">Cancel</a>
        </div>
    </form>
</div>
</script>

<script id="createSnapshotFormTemplate" type="text/html">
<div id="create_snapshot" class="modal hide ">
    <!--
    Description: Create Snapshot Form
    src: templates/forms/createSnapshot.html
    -->
    <div class="modal-header">
        <a id="close" href="#" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</a>
        <h3>Create Snapshot</h3>
    </div>
    <div class="modal-body clearfix">
        <div class="left">
            <fieldset>
                <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                    <label for="id_instance">Instance ID</label>
                    <span class="help-block"></span>
                    <div class="input">
                        <input readonly="readonly" type="text" name="instance" value="<%= model.id %>" id="id_instance" />
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                    <label for="id_password">Snapshot Name</label>
                    <span class="help-block"></span>
                    <div class="input">
                        <input type="text" name="snapshot_name" value="" id="snapshot_name" />
                    </div>
                </div>
            </fieldset>
        </div>
        <div class="right">
            <h3>Description:</h3>
            <p>
                Snapshots preserve the disk state of a running instance.
            </p>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="modal-footer">
        <a id="updateBtn" class="btn btn-blue pull-right" data-dismiss="modal">Create Snapshot</a>
        <a id="cancelBtn" class="close btn seconday cancel close" data-dismiss="modal">Cancel</a>
        <!--<a id="cancelBtn" class="btn secondary cancel close">Cancel</a>-->
    </div>
</div>
</script><script id="createVolumeSnapshotFormTemplate" type="text/html">
<div id="create_volume_snapshot_modal" class="modal hide in" style="top: 107px; display: block; ">
    <!--
    Description: Create Volume Snapshot Form
    src: templates/forms/createVolumeSnapshot.html
    -->
    <div class="modal-header">
        <a href="#" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">×</a>
        <h3>Create Volume Snapshot</h3>
    </div>

    <div class="modal-body clearfix">

        <div class="left">
            <fieldset>

                <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                    <label for="id_name">Snapshot Name</label>

                    <span class="help-block" style="display: none; "></span>
                    <div class="input">
                        <input id="id_name" type="text" name="name" maxlength="255">
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                    <label for="id_description">Description</label>

                    <span class="help-block" style="display: none; "></span>
                    <div class="input">
                        <textarea id="id_description" rows="10" cols="40" name="description"></textarea>
                    </div>
                </div>

            </fieldset>
        </div>
        <div class="right">
            <h3>Description:</h3>
            <p>
                Volumes are block devices that can be attached to instances.
            </p>
        </div>

    </div>
    <div class="modal-footer">
        <input id="createBtn" class="btn btn-blue pull-right" type="submit" value="Create Volume Snapshot">
        </input>
        <a class="btn secondary cancel close">Cancel</a>
    </div>
</div>
</script><script id="createVolumeFormTemplate" type="text/html">
<div id="create_volume_modal" class="modal hide in" style="display: block; ">
    <!--
    Description: Create Volume Form
    src: templates/forms/createVolume.html
    -->
    <div class="modal-header">
        <a href="#" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">×</a>
        <h3>Create Volume</h3>
    </div>

    <form class="" action="#" method="#">
        <div class="modal-body clearfix">

            <div class="left">
                <fieldset>

                    <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                        <label for="id_name">Volume Name</label>

                        <span class="help-block" style="display: none; "></span>
                        <div class="input">
                            <input id="id_name" type="text" name="name" maxlength="255">
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                        <label for="id_description">Description</label>

                        <span class="help-block" style="display: none; "></span>
                        <div class="input">
                            <textarea id="id_description" rows="10" cols="40" name="description"></textarea>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                        <label for="id_size">Size (GB)</label>

                        <span class="help-block" style="display: none; "></span>
                        <div class="input">
                            <input type="text" name="size" id="id_size">
                        </div>
                    </div>

                </fieldset>
            </div>
            <div class="right">
                <h3>Description:</h3>
                <p>
                    Volumes are block devices that can be attached to instances.
                </p>
            </div>

        </div>
        <div class="modal-footer">
            <a id="createBtn" class="btn btn-blue pull-right" data-dismiss="modal">Create Volume</a>
            <a id="cancelBtn" class="close btn seconday cancel close" data-dismiss="modal">Cancel</a>
            <!--<a id="cancelBtn" class="btn secondary cancel close">Cancel</a>-->
        </div>
    </form>
</div>
</script><script id="editVolumeAttachmentsFormTemplate" type="text/html">
<div id="attach_volume_modal" class="modal hide in" style="display: block; ">
    <!--
    Description: Edit Volume Attachments Form
    src: templates/forms/editVolumeAttachments.html
    -->
    <div class="modal-header">
        <a href="#" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">×</a>
        <h3>Manage Volume Attachments</h3>
    </div>

    <div class="modal-body">

        <div class="table_wrapper">

            <table id="attachments" class="table table-bordered table-striped">
                <thead>
                    <tr class="table_caption">
                        <th class="table_header" colspan="4"><h3 class="table_title">Attachments</h3>
                        <div class="table_actions clearfix">

                            <button id="attachments__action_detach" disabled=true class="btn btn-small btn-danger btn-detach detach-Volumes" name="action" value="attachments__detach" type="submit">
                                Detach Volumes
                            </button>

                        </div></th>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>

                        <th class="multi_select_column"></th>

                        <th class="">Instance</th>

                        <th class="">Device</th>

                        <th class="actions_column">Actions</th>

                    </tr>
                </thead>
                <tbody>
                    <%
                    for (var index in model.get("attachments")) {
                    var attach = model.get("attachments")[index];
                    %>
                    <tr id="attachments__row__<%=attach.volume_id%>" class="">
                        <td class="multi_select_column">
                        <input type="checkbox" class="checkbox_attachments" name="object_ids" value="<%=attach.server_id%>">
                        </td>
                        <td class=""><%=attach.server_id%></td>
                        <td class=""><%=attach.device%></td>
                        <td class="actions_column">
                        <button id="attachments__row_<%=attach.volume_id%>__action_detach" class="btn btn-small btn-danger btn-detach detachBtn" name="action" value="<%=attach.server_id%>" type="submit">
                            Detach Volume
                        </button></td>
                    </tr>
                    <%
                    }
                    %>
                </tbody>
                <tfoot>
                    <tr>
                        <td colspan="4"><span>Displaying <%=model.get("attachments").length%> items</span></td>

                    </tr>
                </tfoot>
            </table>

        </div>

    </div>
    <hr>

    <div class="modal-body clearfix">

        <h3>Attach To Instance</h3>
        <fieldset>

            <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                <label for="id_instance">Attach to Instance</label>

                <span class="help-block" style="display: none; ">Select an instance to attach to.</span>
                <div class="input">
                    <select name="instance" id="id_instance">
                        <option value="" selected="selected">Select an instance</option>
                        <%
                        for (var index in instancesModel.models) {
                        var instance = instancesModel.models[index];
                        %>
                        <option value="<%=instance.id%>"><%= instance.get("name")%> (<%=instance.id%>)</option>
                        <%
                        }
                        %>
                    </select>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                <label for="id_device">Device Name</label>

                <span class="help-block" style="display: none; "></span>
                <div class="input">
                    <input type="text" name="device" value="/dev/vdc" id="id_device">
                </div>
            </div>

        </fieldset>

    </div>
    <div class="modal-footer">
        <input class="btn btn-blue pull-right attachBtn" type="submit" value="Attach Volume">
        <a class="btn secondary cancel close cancelBtn">Cancel</a>
    </div>
</div>
</script><script id="launchImageTemplate" type="text/html">
<div id="launch_image" class="modal hide  in" style="display: block; ">
    <!--
    Description: Launch ImageForm
    src: templates/forms/launchImage.html
    -->
    <div class="modal-header">
        <a id="close-image" href="#" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</a>
        <h3>Launch Instances</h3>
    </div>

    <div class="modal-body clearfix">

        <div class="left">
            <fieldset>

                <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                    <label for="id_name">Server Name</label>

                    <span class="help-block" style="display: none; "></span>
                    <div class="input">
                        <input id="id_name" type="text" name="name" maxlength="80">
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                    <label for="id_user_data">User Data</label>

                    <span class="help-block" style="display: none; "></span>
                    <div class="input">
                        <textarea id="id_user_data" rows="10" cols="40" name="user_data"></textarea>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                    <label for="id_flavor">Flavor</label>

                    <span class="help-block" style="display: none; ">Size of image to launch.</span>
                    <div class="input">
                        <select name="flavor" id="id_flavor">

                            <%
                            for (var index in flavors.models) {
                            var flavor = flavors.models[index];
                            %>
                            <option value="<%=flavor.id%>"><%=flavor.get("name") + " (" + flavor.get("vcpus") + "VCPU / " + flavor.get("disk") + "GB Disk / " + flavor.get("ram") + "MB Ram )" %></option>
                            <%}%>
                        </select>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                    <label for="id_keypair">Keypair</label>

                    <span class="help-block" style="display: none; ">Which keypair to use for authentication.</span>
                    <div class="input">
                        <select name="keypair" id="id_keypair">
                            <% if (keypairs.size() == 0) { %>
                            <option value="" selected="selected">No keypairs available.</option>
                            <% } else {
                            for (var index in keypairs.models) {
                            var keypair = keypairs.models[index];
                            %>
                            <option value="" selected="selected">Select a keypair</option>
                            <option value="<%=keypair.get('name')%>"><%= keypair.get("name")%></option>
                            <%  }
                            }%>
                        </select>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                    <label for="id_count">Instance Count</label>

                    <span class="help-block" style="display: none; ">Number of instances to launch.</span>
                    <div class="input">
                        <input type="text" name="count" value="1" id="id_count">
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                    <label for="id_security_groups_0">Security Groups</label>

                    <span class="help-block" style="display: none; ">Launch instance in these security groups.</span>
                    <div class="input">
                        <ul>
                            <li>
                                <label for="id_security_groups_0">
                                    <input checked="checked" type="checkbox" name="security_groups" value="default" id="id_security_groups_0">
                                    default</label>
                            </li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="control-group form-field clearfix hide">
                    <label for="id_volume">Volume or Volume Snapshot</label>

                    <span class="help-block" style="display: none; ">Volume to boot from.</span>
                    <div class="input">
                        <select name="volume" id="id_volume">
                            <option value="" selected="selected">Select Volume</option>
                        </select>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="control-group form-field clearfix hide">
                    <label for="id_device_name">Device Name</label>

                    <span class="help-block" style="display: none; ">Volume mount point (e.g. 'vda' mounts at '/dev/vda').</span>
                    <div class="input">
                        <input type="text" name="device_name" value="vda" id="id_device_name">
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="control-group form-field clearfix hide">
                    <label for="id_delete_on_terminate">Delete on Terminate</label>

                    <span class="help-block" style="display: none; ">Delete volume on instance terminate</span>
                    <div class="input">
                        <input type="checkbox" name="delete_on_terminate" id="id_delete_on_terminate">
                    </div>
                </div>

            </fieldset>
        </div>
        <div class="right">
            <h3>Description:</h3>
            <p>
                Specify the details for launching an instance. The chart below shows the resources used by this project in relation to the project's quotas.
            </p>
            <h3>Project Quotas</h3>

            <div class="quota_title">

                </p>
            </div>

</script><script id="createContainerFormTemplate" type="text/html">
<div id="create_container" class="modal hide in" style="top: 107px; display: block; ">
    <!--
    Description: Create Volume Snapshot Form
    src: templates/forms/createVolumeSnapshot.html
    -->

    <div class="modal-header">
        <a id="close" href="#" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">×</a>
        <h3>Create Container</h3>
    </div>
    <form action="" id="create_container_form">
        <div class="modal-body clearfix">
            <div class="left">
                <fieldset>
                    <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                        <label for="id_name">Container Name</label>

                        <span class="help-block" style="display: none; "></span>
                        <div class="input">
                            <input id="id_name" type="text" name="name" maxlength="255">
                        </div>
                    </div>

                </fieldset>
            </div>
            <div class="right">
                <h3>Description:</h3>
                <p>
                    A container is a storage compartment for your data and provides a way for you to organize your data. You can think of a container as a folder in Windows ® or a directory in UNIX ®. The primary difference between a container and these other file system concepts is that containers cannot be nested. You can, however, create an unlimited number of containers within your account. Data must be stored in a container so you must have at least one container defined in your account prior to uploading data.
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="modal-footer">
            <a id="submit" class="btn btn-blue pull-right" data-dismiss="modal">Create Container</a>
            <a href="#objectstorage/containers/" id="cancelBtn" class="btn secondary cancel close">Cancel</a>
        </div>
    </form>
</div>
</script><script id="uploadObjectFormTemplate" type="text/html">
<div id="upload_object" class="modal hide in" style="top: 80px; display: block; ">
    <div class="modal-header">
        <a href="#" id="close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">×</a>
        <h3>Upload Object To Container: <%= model.get('name')%></h3>
    </div>

    <div class="modal-body clearfix">

        <div class="left">
            <fieldset>

                <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                    <label for="id_name">Object Name</label>

                    <span class="help-block" style="display: none; "></span>
                    <div class="input">
                        <input id="id_name" type="text" name="name" maxlength="255">
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="control-group form-field clearfix">
                    <label for="id_object_file">File</label>

                    <span class="help-block" style="display: none; "></span>
                    <div class="input">
                        <input type="file" name="object_file" id="id_object_file">
                    </div>
                </div>

            </fieldset>
        </div>
        <div class="right">
            <h3>Description:</h3>
            <p>
                An object is the basic storage entity and any optional metadata that represents the files you store in the OpenStack Object Storage system. When you upload data to OpenStack Object Storage, the data is stored as-is (no compression or encryption) and consists of a location (container), the object's name, and any metadata consisting of key/value pairs.
            </p>
        </div>

    </div>
    <div class="modal-footer">
        <button id="submit" class="btn btn-primary pull-right">
            Upload Object
        </button>
        <a id="cancelBtn" class="close btn seconday cancel close" data-dismiss="modal">Cancel</a>
    </div>
</div>

</script><script id="novaInstanceSnapshotsTemplate" type="text/html">
<!--
Description: Instances Snapshots
src: templates/root/nova/snapshots/instanceSnapshots.html
-->
<div class="table_wrapper">
    <div style='display:none'></div>
    <div class='table_header'>
        <h3 class='table_title'>Instance Snapshots</h3>
        <div class="table_actions clearfix">
            <button id='instance_delete' class='btn btn-small btn-danger btn-delete-group-instances' disabled=true name="action" value="snapshots__delete" type="submit">
                Delete Snapshots
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>
    <table id="instance_snapshots" class="table table-bordered table-striped">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th class="multi_select_column"></th>
                <th class="">Name</th>
                <th class="">Type</th>
                <th class="">Status</th>
                <th class="">Public</th>
                <th class="hidden-phone">Container Format</th>
                <th class="actions_column hidden-phone">Actions</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <% 	var num_snapshots=0;
            for (var index in models) {
            var image = models[index];
            var image_type = image.get('metadata').image_type;
            if (image_type == "snapshot") {
            num_snapshots++;
            %>
            <tr id="images__row__<%= models.length %>" class="">
                <td class="multi_select_column">
                <input type="checkbox" name="object_ids" class="checkbox_instances" id="checkbox_instances_<%= image.get('id')%>" value="<%= image.get('id')%>" />
                </td>
                <td class=""><a href="#nova/images_and_snapshots/<%= image.get('id')%>"><%= image.get('name')%></a></td>
                <td class="">Snapshot</td>
                <td class=""><%=image.get('status').toLowerCase()%></td>
                <td class="" data-i18n="Yes">Yes</td>
                <td class="hidden-phone">AMI</td>
                <td class="actions_column hidden-phone">
                <div id="dropdown_instances_<%= image.get('id') %>" class="btn-group">
                    <button class="ajax-modal btn btn-small btn-launch-instances btn-small btn-blue" value="<%= image.get('id')%>" data-i18n="Launch">
                        Launch
                    </button>
                    <a class="btn dropdown-toggle btn-small btn-blue" data-toggle="dropdown" href="#"> <span class="caret caret-white"></span> </a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu row_actions clearfix">
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button id="instance_snapshot__action_edit"  class="ajax-modal btn btn-small btn-edit-instances" value="<%= image.get('id')%>" name="action" type="submit" data-i18n="Edit">
                                Edit
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button id="instance_snapshot__action_delete"  class="ajax-modal btn btn-danger btn-delete-instances" value="<%= image.get('id')%>" name="action" type="submit" data-i18n="Delete Snapshot">
                                Delete Snapshot
                            </button>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div></td>
            </tr>
            <% } } %>
        </tbody>
        <tfoot>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="7"><span class="blue"><%=UTILS.i18n.pluralise("Displaying %s item", "Displaying %s items", num_snapshots)%></span></td>
            </tr>
        </tfoot>
    </table>
</div>
</script><script id="novaVolumeSnapshotsTemplate" type="text/html">
<!--
Description: Volume Snapshots
src: templates/root/nova/snapshots/volumeSnapshots.html
-->
<div class="table_wrapper">
    <div style='display:none'></div>
    <div class='table_header'>
        <h3 class='table_title'>Volume Snapshots</h3>
        <div class="table_actions clearfix">
            <button id="volume_snapshots_delete" class='btn btn-small btn-danger btn-delete-group' disabled=true name="action" value="volume_snapshots__delete" type="submit" data-i18n="Delete Volume Snapshots">
                Delete Volume Snapshots
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>
    <table id="volume_snapshots" class="table table-bordered table-striped">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th class="multi_select_column"></th>
                <th class="">Name</th>
                <th class="hidden-phone">Description</th>
                <th class="">Size</th>
                <th class="">Status</th>
                <th class="">Volume ID</th>
                <th class="actions_column hidden-phone">Actions</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <%  var volSnapshot = models[index];
            for (var index in models) {
            var volSnapshot = models[index];
            %>
            <tr id="volume_snapshots__row__<%= models.length %>" class="">
                <td class="multi_select_column">
                <input type="checkbox" name="object_ids" class="checkbox checkbox_volumes" id="checkbox_<%= volSnapshot.get('id')%>" value="<%= volSnapshot.get('id')%>" />
                </td>
                <td class=""><a href="#nova/images_and_snapshots/<%= volSnapshot.get('id')%>"><%= volSnapshot.get('display_name')%></a></td>
                <td class="hidden-phone"><%=volSnapshot.get('display_description')%></td>
                <td class=""><%=volSnapshot.get('size')+" GB"%></td>
                <td class=""><%=volSnapshot.get('status')%></td>
                <td class=""><%=volSnapshot.get('volume_id')%></td>
                <td class="actions_column hidden-phone">
                <button id="volume_snapshot__action_delete" class="ajax-modal btn btn-small btn-danger btn-delete-volume" value="<%= volSnapshot.get('id')%>" name="action" type="submit" data-i18n="Delete Volume Snapshot">
                    Delete Volume Snapshot
                </button></td>
            </tr>
            <% } %>
        </tbody>
        <tfoot>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="7"><span class="blue"><%=UTILS.i18n.pluralise("Displaying %s item", "Displaying %s items", models.length)%></span></td>
                </td>
        </tfoot>
    </table>
</div>
</script><script id="novaInstancesAndVolumesTemplate" type="text/html">
<!--
Description: Instances And Volumes
src: templates/root/nova/instancesAndVolumes.html
-->
<div id="instances"></div>
<div id="volumes"></div>
</script><script id="novaInstancesTemplate" type="text/html">
<!--
Description: Instances
src: templates/root/nova/instancesAndVolumes/instances.html
-->
<div class="table_wrapper">
    <div class='table_header'>
        <h3 class='table_title' data-i18n="Instances">Instances</h3>
        <div class="table_actions clearfix">
            <a href='#nova/images_and_snapshots/'  id="instances__action_launch__1" class="btn btn-small btn-blue btn-launch" data-i18n="Launch Instance">Launch Instance</a>
            <button  id="instances_terminate" disabled=true class="btn btn-small btn-danger btn-terminate-group" name="action" value="instances__terminate" class="instances_terminate" type="submit" data-i18n="Terminate Instance">
                Terminate Instances
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>
    <table id="instances" class="table table-bordered table-striped">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th class="multi_select_column"></th>
                <th class="" data-i18n="Instance Name">Instance Name</th>
                <th class="hidden-phone" data-i18n="IP Address">IP Address</th>
                <th class="" data-i18n="Size">Size</th>
                <th class="" data-i18n="Status">Status</th>
                <th class="hidden-phone" data-i18n="Task">Task</th>
                <th class="hidden-phone" data-i18n="Power State">Power State</th>
                <th class="actions_column hidden-phone" data-i18n="Actions">Actions</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <%
            var flavorlist = {};
            for (var index in flavors.models) {
                var flavor = flavors.models[index];
                flavorlist[flavor.id] = flavor.get("ram") + " MB RAM | " + flavor.get("vcpus") + " VCPU | " + flavor.get("disk") + "GB Disk";
            }
            var i = 0;
            var POWER_STATES = {
                0: "NO STATE",
                1: "RUNNING",
                2: "BLOCKED",
                3: "PAUSED",
                4: "SHUTDOWN",
                5: "SHUTOFF",
                6: "CRASHED",
                7: "SUSPENDED",
                8: "FAILED",
                9: "BUILDING"
            };
            for (var index in models) {
                i++;
                var instance = models[index];
            %>
            <tr id="instances__row__<%= instance.id %>"
            class="ajax-update status_down">
                <td class="multi_select_column">
                <input id="checkbox_<%= instance.get('id')%>" type="checkbox" name="object_ids" class="checkbox checkbox_instances"  value="<%= instance.get('id') %>" />
                </td>
                <td class=""><a href="#nova/instances_and_volumes/instances/<%= instance.id %>/detail"><%= instance.get("name") %></a></td>
                <td class="hidden-phone">
                <ul>
                    <%
                    if (instance.get("addresses") != null && instance.get("addresses").public != null) {
                        var addresses = instance.get("addresses").public;
                        var i = 0;
                        for (var index in addresses) {
                            i++;
                            var address = addresses[index];
                    %>
                    <li>
                        <%= address.addr %>
                    </li>
                    <%  }
                    } 
                    %>
                </ul></td>
                <td class=""><%=flavorlist[instance.get("flavor").id]%></td>
                <td class="status_down"><%= instance.get("status") %></td>
                <td class="status_unknown hidden-phone"><%= instance.get("OS-EXT-STS:task_state") ? instance.get("OS-EXT-STS:task_state") : "None"%></td>
                <td class="hidden-phone"><%= POWER_STATES[instance.get("OS-EXT-STS:power_state")]%></td>
                <td class="actions_column hidden-phone">
                <div id="dropdown_<%= instance.get('id') %>" class="btn-group">
                    <button  id="instances__action_e__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-edit btn-edit-instances" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Edit Instance">
                        Edit Instance
                    </button>
                    <a class="btn btn-blue dropdown-toggle btn-small" data-toggle="dropdown" href="#"> <span class="caret caret-white"></span> </a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu row_actions clearfix">
                        <%
                        if (instance.get("status") != "ERROR") {
                            if (instance.get("status") != "PAUSED" && instance.get("status") != "SUSPENDED") {%>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_vnc__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-vnc" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="VNC Console">
                                VNC Console
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_log__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-log" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="View Log">
                                View Log
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_snapshot__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-snapshot" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Snapshot">
                                Snapshot
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_pause__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-pause" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Pause Instance">
                                Pause Instance
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_suspend__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-suspend" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Suspend Instance">
                                Suspend Instance
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_password__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-danger btn-password" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Change Password">
                                Change Password
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_reboot__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-danger btn-reboot" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Reboot Instance">
                                Reboot Instance
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <% 
                        } 
                        else if (instance.get("status") == "PAUSED") {
                        %>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_unpause__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-unpause" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Unpause Instance">
                                Unpause Instance
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <% } else { %>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_resume__<%=i%>" class="btn  btn-blue btn-small btn-resume" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Resume Instance">
                                Resume Instance
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <% } %>
                        <% } %>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_terminate__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-small btn-danger btn-terminate" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Terminate Instance">
                                Terminate Instance
                            </button>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div></td>
            </tr>
            <% } %>
        </tbody>
        <tfoot>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="8"><span class="blue"><%=UTILS.i18n.pluralise("Displaying %s item", "Displaying %s items", models.length)%></span></td>
            </tr>
        </tfoot>
    </table>
</div>
</script><script id="novaVolumesTemplate" type="text/html">
<!--
Description: Volumes
src: templates/root/nova/instancesAndVolumes/volumes.html
-->
<div id="volumes" class="table_wrapper">
    <div style='display:none'></div>
    <div class='table_header'>
        <h3 class='table_title'>Volumes</h3>
        <div class="table_actions clearfix">
            <button id="volumes_create" class="btn btn-small ajax-modal btn-create-volume btn-blue" name="action" value="volumes__create" type="submit" data-i18n="Create Volume">
                Create Volume
            </button>
            <button id="volumes_delete" disabled=true class="btn btn-small btn-danger btn-delete-group" name="action" value="volumes__delete" class="volumes_delete" type="submit" data-i18n="Delete Volume">
                Delete Volumes
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>
    <table id="volumes" class="table table-bordered table-striped">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th class="multi_select_column"></th>
                <th class="">Name</th>
                <th class="hidden-phone">Description</th>
                <th class="">Size</th>
                <th class="">Status</th>
                <th class="">Attachments</th>
                <th class="actions_column hidden-phone">Actions</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <%
            var i = 0;
            for (var index in models) {
            i++;
            var volume = models[index];
            %>
            <tr id="volumes__row__<%=volume.id%>" class="status_up">
                <td class="multi_select_column">
                <input id="checkbox_<%= volume.get('id')%>" type="checkbox" name="object_ids" class="checkbox checkbox_volumes"  value="<%= volume.get('id') %>" />
                </td>
                <td class=""><a href="#nova/instances_and_volumes/volumes/<%=volume.id%>/detail"><%= volume.get("display_name")%></a></td>
                <td class="hidden-phone"><%= volume.get("display_description")%></td>
                <td class=""><%= volume.get("size")%> GB</td>
                <td class="status_unknown"><i class="icon-updating ajax-updating"></i><%= volume.get("status")%></td>
                <td class=""><%= (volume.get("attachments").length == 0) ? "-": volume.get("attachments").length%></td>
                <td class="actions_column hidden-phone"> <% if (volume.get("status") != "error") {%>
                <div class="btn-group">
                    <a id="volumes__row_<%= volume.get("id")%>__action_attachments" value="<%= volume.id %>" class="btn btn-blue ajax-modal btn-edit btn-small btn-edit-volumes ellipsis w120">Edit Attachments</a>
                    <% if (volume.get("status") != "in-use") {%>
                    <a class="btn dropdown-toggle ajax-modal btn-edit btn-blue btn-small" data-toggle="dropdown" href="#"> <span class="caret caret-white"></span> </a>

                    <ul class="dropdown-menu row_actions clearfix">
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button value="<%= volume.id %>" id="volumes__row_<%= volume.get("id")%>__action_snapshots" class="btn btn-small ajax-modal btn-camera">
                                Create Snapshot
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button id="volumes__row_<%= volume.get("id")%>__action_delete" class="btn btn-small btn-danger btn-delete-volume" name="action" value="<%= volume.get("id")%>" type="submit">
                                Delete Volume
                            </button>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                    <% }%>
                </div> <% } else { %>
                <button "volumes__row_<%= volume.get("id")%>__action_delete" class="btn btn-small btn-danger btn-delete-volume" name="action" value="<%= volume.get("id")%>" type="submit" data-i18n="Delete Volume">
                    Delete Volume
                </button> <%}%> </td>
            </tr>
            <% } %>
        </tbody>
        <tfoot>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="7"><span class="blue">Displaying <%= models.length %> items</span></td>
            </tr>
        </tfoot>
    </table>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid">
    <ul class="breadcrumb">
        <li>
            <a href="#nova/vdcs/"><strong>VDCs</strong></a><span class="divider">/</span>
        </li>
        <li>
            <a href="#nova/vdcs/<%= vdc %>"><%= vdc %></a><span class="divider">/</span>
        </li>
        <li>
            <a href="#nova/vdcs/<%= vdc %>/<%= service %>"><%= service %></a><span class="divider">/</span>
        </li>
        <li>
            <%= model.get("name") %>
        </li>
    </ul>
    <h2>Instance Detail</h2>
    <div class="span12">
        <ul id="instance_details" class="nav nav-tabs">
            <li id="overview" class="<%= (subview == 'overview') ? 'active':'' %>">
                <a id="overviewBtn" data-i18n="Overview">Overview</a>
            </li>
            <li id="log" class="<%= (subview == 'logs') ? 'active':'' %>">

            </li>

                        </li>
                        <li>
                            <strong>ID:</strong>&nbsp;<%=model.get("id")%>
                        </li>

                            </ul>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                <div class="meta row-fluid">
                    <h4>Meta</h4>
                    <hr class="header_rule">
                    <ul>
                        <li>
                            <strong>Key name:</strong>&nbsp;<%=model.get("key_name")%>
                        </li>

                            <em>No volumes attached.</em>
                        </li>

                    </ul>
                </div>

                    <h3 class="pull-left">Instance Console Log</h3>
                </div>
                <pre class="logs"><%= logs %></pre>
            </div>

                <h3>Instance VNC Console</h3>
                <p class="alert alert-info">
                    If VNC console is not responding to keyboard input: click the grey status bar below.
                </p>
                <iframe src="<%= vncUrl %>" width="720" height="450"></iframe>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    -->

                </li>
            </ul>
            <div class="tab-content">
                <div id="image_details__overview" class="tab-pane active">
                    <h3>Instance Overview</h3>
                    <div class="info row-fluid">
                        <h4>Info</h4>
                        <hr class="header_rule">
                        <ul>

                            </li>
                            <li>

                            </li>

                            </li>

                            </li>

                            </li>

<div class="row-fluid">
    <div class="span12">

        <ul id="volume_details" class="nav nav-tabs ajax-tabs">

            <li class="active">
                <a href="" data-toggle="tab" data-target="#volume_details__overview" data-loaded="true">Overview</a>
            </li>

        </ul>

        <div class="tab-content">

            <div id="volume_details__overview" class="tab-pane active">

                <h3>Volume Overview: <%= model.get("display_name") %></h3>

                <div class="info row-fluid">
                    <h4>Info</h4>
                    <hr class="header_rule">
                    <dl>
                        <dt>
                            Name
                        </dt>
                        <dd>
                            <%= model.get("display_name") %>
                        </dd>
                        <dt>
                            ID
                        </dt>
                        <dd>
                            <%= model.get("id") %>
                        </dd>

                        <dt>
                            Description
                        </dt>
                        <dd>
                            <%= model.get("display_description") %>
                        </dd>

                        <dt>
                            Status
                        </dt>
                        <dd>
                            <%= model.get("status") %>
                        </dd>
                    </dl>
                </div>

                    <h4>Specs</h4>
                    <hr class="header_rule">
                    <dl>
                        <dt>
                            Size
                        </dt>
                        <dd>
                            <%= model.get("size") %> GB
                        </dd>
                        <dt>

                        </dt>
                        <dd>
                            <%= model.get("created") %>
                        </dd>
                    </dl>
                </div>

                    <h4>Attachments</h4>
                    <hr class="header_rule">

                    <ul>
                        <li>
                            <em>Not attached</em>
                        </li>
                    </ul>

                </div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>

</script><script id="novaVDCsTemplate" type="text/html">
<!--
Description: VDCs
src: templates/root/nova/VDCs.html
-->
<div class="table_wrapper">
    <ul class="breadcrumb">
        <li>
            <strong>VDCs</strong>
        </li>
    </ul>
    <div class='table_header'>
        <h3>All Virtual Data Centers</h3>
        <div class="table_actions clearfix">
            <button href='#nova/vdcs/'  id="instances__action_launch__1" class="btn btn-small btn-blue btn-launch" data-i18n="Launch VDC">
                Launch VDC
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>
    <p></p>

    <table id="instances" class="table table-bordered table-striped">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th class="" data-i18n="VDC Name">VDC Name</th>
                <th class="hidden-phone" data-i18n="VCPUs">VCPUs</th>
                <th class="hidden-phone" data-i18n="Disk">Disk</th>
                <th class="hidden-phone" data-i18n="RAM">RAM</th>
                <th class="" data-i18n="VCPU Hours">VCPU Hours</th>
                <th class="" data-i18n="Disk GB Hours">Disk GB Hours</th>
                <th class="actions_column hidden-phone" data-i18n="Actions">Actions</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <%
            for (var index in models) {
            var vdc = models[index];
            %>
            <tr id="instances__row__<%= vdc.id %>" class="ajax-update status_down">
                <td class=""><a href="#nova/vdcs/<%= vdc.id %>"><%= vdc.get("name") %></a></td>
                <td class="hidden-phone"><%=vdc.get("vcpus")%></td>
                <td class="hidden-phone"><%=vdc.get("disk")%></td>
                <td class="hidden-phone"><%=vdc.get("ram")%></td>
                <td class=""><%=vdc.get("vcpu_hours")%></td>
                <td class=""><%=vdc.get("disk_hours")%></td>
                <td class="actions_column hidden-phone">
                <div id="dropdown_<%= vdc.get('id') %>" class="btn-group">
                    <button  id="vdcs__action_e__<%=vdc.id%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-edit btn-edit-vdcs" name="action" value="<%= vdc.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Edit VDC">
                        Edit VDC
                    </button>
                    <a class="btn btn-blue dropdown-toggle btn-small" data-toggle="dropdown" href="#"> <span class="caret caret-white"></span> </a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu row_actions clearfix">
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="vdcs__action_delete__<%=vdc.id%>" class="btn btn-small btn-danger btn-delete" name="action" value="<%= vdc.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Delete VDC">
                                Delete VDC
                            </button>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div></td>
            </tr>
            <% } %>
        </tbody>
        <tfoot>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="8"><span class="blue"><%=UTILS.i18n.pluralise("Displaying %s item", "Displaying %s items", models.length)%></span></td>
            </tr>
        </tfoot>
    </table>
</div>
</script><script id="novaVDCTemplate" type="text/html">
<!--
Description: VDC
src: templates/root/nova/VDC.html
-->
<div class="table_wrapper" id="vdc">
    <ul class="breadcrumb">
        <li>
            <a href="#nova/vdcs/"><strong>VDCs</strong></a><span class="divider">/</span>
        </li>
        <li>
            <%= vdc %>
        </li>
    </ul>
    <br/>
    <div class='table_header'>
        <h3>All Services</h3>
        <div class="table_actions clearfix">
            <button id="btn-create-service" class="btn btn-small btn-blue btn-launch" data-i18n="Launch Service">
                Launch Service
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>
    <table id="instances" class="table table-bordered table-striped">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th class="" data-i18n="VDC Name">Service Name</th>
                <th class="hidden-phone" data-i18n="VCPUs">VCPUs</th>
                <th class="hidden-phone" data-i18n="Disk">Disk</th>
                <th class="hidden-phone" data-i18n="RAM">RAM</th>
                <th class="" data-i18n="VCPU Hours">VCPU Hours</th>
                <th class="" data-i18n="Disk GB Hours">Disk GB Hours</th>
                <th class="actions_column hidden-phone" data-i18n="Actions">Actions</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <%
            for (var index in models) {
            var service = models[index];
            %>
            <tr id="instances__row__<%= service.id %>" class="ajax-update status_down">
                <td class=""><a href="#nova/vdcs/<%= vdc %>/<%= service.id %>"><%= service.get("name") %></a></td>
                <td class="hidden-phone"><%=service.get("vcpus")%></td>

                <div id="dropdown_<%= service.get('id') %>" class="btn-group">
                    <button  id="vdcs__action_e__<%=service.id%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-edit btn-edit-services" name="action" value="<%= service.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Edit Service">
                        Edit Service
                    </button>
                    <a class="btn btn-blue dropdown-toggle btn-small" data-toggle="dropdown" href="#"> <span class="caret caret-white"></span> </a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu row_actions clearfix">
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="services__action_delete__<%=service.id%>" class="btn btn-small btn-danger btn-delete" name="action" value="<%= service.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Delete Service">
                                Delete Service
                            </button>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div></td>
            </tr>
            <% } %>
        </tbody>
        <tfoot>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="8"><span class="blue"><%=UTILS.i18n.pluralise("Displaying %s item", "Displaying %s items", models.length)%></span></td>
            </tr>
        </tfoot>
    </table>
</div>
</script><script id="novaVDCServiceTemplate" type="text/html">
<!--
Description: VDCService
src: templates/root/nova/VDCService.html
-->
<div id="vdcservice" class="table_wrapper">
    <ul class="breadcrumb">
        <li>
            <a href="#nova/vdcs/"><strong>VDCs</strong></a><span class="divider">/</span>
        </li>
        <li>
            <a href="#nova/vdcs/<%= vdc %>"><%= vdc %></a><span class="divider">/</span>
        </li>
        <li>
            <%= service %>
        </li>
    </ul>
    <div class='table_header'>
        <h3>All Instances</h3>
        <div class="table_actions clearfix">
            <a href='#nova/images_and_snapshots/'  id="instances__action_launch__1" class="btn btn-small btn-blue btn-launch" data-i18n="Launch Instance">Launch Instance</a>
            <button  id="instances_terminate" disabled=true class="btn btn-small btn-danger btn-terminate-group" name="action" value="instances__terminate" class="instances_terminate" type="submit" data-i18n="Terminate Instance">
                Terminate Instances
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>
    <table id="instances" class="table table-bordered table-striped">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th class="multi_select_column"></th>
                <th class="" data-i18n="Instance Name">Instance Name</th>
                <th class="hidden-phone" data-i18n="IP Address">IP Address</th>
                <th class="" data-i18n="Size">Size</th>
                <th class="" data-i18n="Status">Status</th>
                <th class="hidden-phone" data-i18n="Task">Task</th>
                <th class="hidden-phone" data-i18n="Power State">Power State</th>
                <th class="actions_column hidden-phone" data-i18n="Actions">Actions</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <%
            var flavorlist = {};
            for (var index in flavors.models) {
            var flavor = flavors.models[index];
            flavorlist[flavor.id] = flavor.get("ram") + " MB RAM | " + flavor.get("vcpus") + " VCPU | " + flavor.get("disk") + "GB Disk";
            }
            var i = 0;
            var POWER_STATES = {
            0: "NO STATE",
            1: "RUNNING",
            2: "BLOCKED",
            3: "PAUSED",
            4: "SHUTDOWN",
            5: "SHUTOFF",
            6: "CRASHED",
            7: "SUSPENDED",
            8: "FAILED",
            9: "BUILDING"
            };
            for (var index in models) {
            i++;
            var instance = models[index];
            %>
            <tr id="instances__row__<%= instance.id %>"
            class="ajax-update status_down">
                <td class="multi_select_column">
                <input id="checkbox_<%= instance.get('id')%>" type="checkbox" name="object_ids" class="checkbox checkbox_instances"  value="<%= instance.get('id') %>" />
                </td>
                <td class=""><a href="#nova/vdcs/<%=vdc%>/<%= service %>/<%= instance.id %>"><%= instance.get("name") %></a></td>
                <td class="hidden-phone">
                <ul>
                    <%
                    if (instance.get("addresses") != null && instance.get("addresses").public != null) {
                    var addresses = instance.get("addresses").public;
                    var i = 0;
                    for (var index in addresses) {
                    i++;
                    var address = addresses[index];
                    %>
                    <li>
                        <%= address.addr %>
                    </li>
                    <% }} %>
                </ul></td>
                <td class=""><%=flavorlist[instance.get("flavor").id]%></td>
                <td class="status_down"><%= instance.get("status") %></td>
                <td class="status_unknown hidden-phone"><%= instance.get("OS-EXT-STS:task_state") ? instance.get("OS-EXT-STS:task_state") : "None"%></td>
                <td class="hidden-phone"><%= POWER_STATES[instance.get("OS-EXT-STS:power_state")]%></td>
                <td class="actions_column hidden-phone">
                <div id="dropdown_<%= instance.get('id') %>" class="btn-group">
                    <button  id="instances__action_e__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-edit btn-edit-instances" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Edit Instance">
                        Edit Instance
                    </button>
                    <a class="btn btn-blue dropdown-toggle btn-small" data-toggle="dropdown" href="#"> <span class="caret caret-white"></span> </a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu row_actions clearfix">
                        <%
                        if (instance.get("status") != "ERROR") {
                        if (instance.get("status") != "PAUSED" && instance.get("status") != "SUSPENDED") {%>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <a href="#nova/vdcs/<%=vdc%>/<%= service %>/<%= instance.id %>/?view=vnc" id="instances__action_vnc__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-vnc" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="VNC Console">VNC Console</a>
                        </li>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <a href="#nova/vdcs/<%=vdc%>/<%= service %>/<%= instance.id %>/?view=logs"  id="instances__action_log__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-log" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="View Log">View Log</a>
                        </li>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_snapshot__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-snapshot" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Snapshot">
                                Snapshot
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_pause__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-pause" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Pause Instance">
                                Pause Instance
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_suspend__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-suspend" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Suspend Instance">
                                Suspend Instance
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_password__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-danger btn-password" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Change Password">
                                Change Password
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_reboot__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-danger btn-reboot" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Reboot Instance">
                                Reboot Instance
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <% } else if (instance.get("status") == "PAUSED") { %>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_unpause__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-unpause" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Unpause Instance">
                                Unpause Instance
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <% } else { %>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_resume__<%=i%>" class="btn  btn-blue btn-small btn-resume" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Resume Instance">
                                Resume Instance
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <% } %>
                        <% } %>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_terminate__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-small btn-danger btn-terminate" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Terminate Instance">
                                Terminate Instance
                            </button>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div></td>
            </tr>
            <% } %>
        </tbody>
        <tfoot>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="8"><span class="blue"><%=UTILS.i18n.pluralise("Displaying %s item", "Displaying %s items", models.length)%></span></td>
            </tr>
        </tfoot>
    </table>
</div>

                            </button>
                        </li>

                            </button>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div></td>
                <%
                }
                %>

            </button>

                Delete Objects
            </button>

                <th class="multi_select_column">
                <input type="checkbox">
                </th>
                <th class="">Object Name</th>
                <th class="">Size</th>
                <th class="actions_column">Actions</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <tr id="objects__row__Time" class="" style="">
                <%
                var container = model;
                var i = 0;
                for (var index in container.get('objects')) {
                var object = container.get('objects')[index];
                %>
                <td class="multi_select_column">
                <input id="checkbox_<%= object.id%>" type="checkbox" class="checkbox checkbox_objects" name="object_ids" value="<%= i %>">
                </td>
                <td class=""><%=object.name%></td>
                <td class=""><%=object.size%> KB</td>
                <td class="actions_column">
                <div class="btn-group">
                    <a href="#objectstorage/containers/<%= container.id%>/<%= object.id %>" id="containers__row_<%= object.id%>__action_list_objects" class="ajax-modal btn btn-small btn-blue btn-launch-images">Download</a>
                    <a class="btn dropdown-toggle btn-small btn-blue" data-toggle="dropdown" href="#"> <span class="caret"></span> </a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu row_actions clearfix">
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <a href="#objectstorage/containers/<%= container.id%>/upload" id="containers__row_hola__action_upload" class="ajax-modal btn btn-small ajax-modal btn-upload">Copy</a>
                        </li>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button class="btn btn-small btn-danger btn-delete" name="action" value="<%= i %>" type="submit">
                                Delete Object
                            </button>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div></td>
                <%
                i++;
                }
                %>
            </tr>
        </tbody>
        <tfoot>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="4"><span class="blue">Displaying <%= container.get('objects').length %> items</span></td>
            </tr>
        </tfoot>
    </table>
</div>
