                Delete Images
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>
    <table id="images_tbl" class="table table-bordered table-striped">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th class="multi_select_column"></th>
                <th class="" data-i18n="Image Name">Image Name</th>
                <th class="hidden-phone" data-i18n="Type">Type</th>
                <th class="" data-i18n="Status">Status</th>
                <th class="" data-i18n="Public">Public</th>
                <th class="" data-i18n="Container Format">Container Format</th>
                <th class="actions_column hidden-phone"  data-i18n="Acciones">Actions</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <% 	var i = 0;
            for (var index in models) {
            var image = models[index];
            i++;
            %>
            <tr
            id="images__row__<%= models.length %>"
            class="ajax-update status_down">
                <td class="multi_select_column">
                <input type="checkbox" name="object_ids" class="checkbox" id="checkbox_<%= image.get('id')%>" value="<%= image.get('id')%>" />
                </td>
                <td class=""><a href="#nova/images_and_snapshots/<%= image.get('id')%>"> <%= image.get('name')%> </a></td>
                <td class="hidden-phone" data-i18n="Image">Image</td>
                <td class=""><%=image.get('status').toLowerCase()%></td>
                <td class="" data-i18n="Yes">Yes</td>
                <td class="">ARI</td>
                <td class="actions_column hidden-phone">
                <div id="dropdown_<%= image.get('id') %>" class="btn-group">
                    <a href='#nova/images_and_snapshots/<%= image.get('id')%>/update'  id= "image_edit" name="action" type="submit" class="ajax-modal btn btn-small btn-blue btn-edit"  data-i18n="Edit">Edit</a>
                    <a class="btn btn-small btn-blue dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown" href="#"> <span class="caret-white caret"></span> </a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu row_actions clearfix">
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="images__action_delete__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-small btn-danger btn-delete" name="action" value="<%= image.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Delete">
                                Delete
                            </button>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div></td>
            </tr>
            <% } %>
        </tbody>
        <tfoot>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="7"><span class="blue"><%=UTILS.i18n.pluralise("Displaying %s item", "Displaying %s items", models.length)%></span></td>
                </td>
        </tfoot>
    </table>
</div>

<!--
Description: Overview
src: templates/root/sys/overview.html
-->
<div class="span12">
    <div class="span12 hidden-desktop">
        <h2>Overview</h2>
    </div>
    <form action="" method="get" id="date_form" class="form-horizontal">
        <h3 data-i18n="Select a month to query its usage:">Select a month to query its usage:</h3>
        <div class="form-row">
            <select name="option_id" id="option_id">
                <option value="1" data-i18n="January">January</option>
                <option value="2" data-i18n="February">February</option>
                <option value="3" selected="selected" data-i18n="March">March</option>
                <option value="4" data-i18n="April">April</option>
                <option value="5" data-i18n="May">May</option>
                <option value="6" data-i18n="June">June</option>
                <option value="7" data-i18n="July">July</option>
                <option value="8" data-i18n="August">August</option>
                <option value="9" data-i18n="September">September</option>
                <option value="10" data-i18n="October">October</option>
                <option value="11" data-i18n="November">November</option>
                <option value="12" data-i18n="December">December</option>
            </select>
        </div>
        <div class="form-row">
            <select name="option_id2" id="option_id2">
                <option value="2012" selected="selected">2012</option>
                <option value="2011">2011</option>
                <option value="2010">2010</option>
                <option value="2009">2009</option>
            </select>
        </div>
        <input class="btn btn-small btn-blue pull-right m-top m-right" type="submit"/>
</div>
</form>

<p id="activity">
    <span><strong data-i18n="Active Instances:">Active Instances:</strong> <span class="blue">1</span></span>
    <span><strong data-i18n="Active Memory:">Active Memory:</strong><span class="blue"> 512MB</span></span>
    <span><strong data-i18n="This Months VCPU-Hours:">This Months VCPU-Hours:</strong><span class="blue"> 336.6</span></span>
    <span><strong data-i18n="This Months GB-Hours:">This Months GB-Hours:</strong> <span class="blue">0</span></span>
</p>

<form action="#syspanel/" method="POST">
    <div class='table_header'>
        <h3 class='table_title' data-i18n="Usage Summary">Usage Summary</h3>
        <div class="table_actions clearfix">
            <input href='?date_month=2012-03-01&amp;date_year=2012-03-15&amp;format=csv'  class="btn btn-small btn-blue" data-i18n="Download CSV Summary">
                Download CSV Summary</a>
        </div>
    </div>
    <table id="global_usage" class="table table-bordered table-striped">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th class="" data-i18n="Project ID">Project ID</th>
                <th class="" data-i18n="VCPUs">VCPUs</th>
                <th class="" data-i18n="Disk">Disk</th>
                <th class="" data-i18n="RAM">RAM</th>
                <th class="" data-i18n="VCPU Hours">VCPU Hours</th>
                <th class="hidden-phone" data-i18n="Disk GB Hours">Disk GB Hours</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <tr id="global_usage__row__2" class="">
                <td class="">2</td><td class="">1</td><td class="">-</td><td class="">512MB</td><td class="">336.6</td><td class="hidden-phone">-</td>
            </tr>
        </tbody>
        <tfoot>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="6"><span class="blue"><%=UTILS.i18n.pluralise("Displaying %s item", "Displaying %s items", 1)%></span></td>
                </td>
        </tfoot>
    </table>
</form>
</div></div>
</script>

<script id="instancesTemplate" type="text/html">
<!--
Description: Instances
src: templates/root/sys/instances.html
-->
<div id="instances" class="table_wrapper">
    <div class='table_header'>
        <div class="table_actions clearfix">
            <button  id="instances_terminate" disabled=true class="btn btn-small btn-danger btn-terminate-group" name="action" value="instances__terminate" class="instances_terminate" type="submit" data-i18n="Terminate Instance">
                Terminate Instances
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>
    <table id="instances" class="table table-bordered table-striped">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th class="multi_select_column"></th>
                <th class="hidden-phone" data-i18n="Tenant">Tenant</th>
                <th class="hidden-phone" data-i18n="Host">Host</th>
                <th class="" data-i18n="Instance Name">Instance Name</th>
                <th class="hidden-phone" data-i18n="IP Address">IP Address</th>
                <th class="hidden-phone" data-i18n="Size">Size</th>
                <th class="" data-i18n="Status">Status</th>
                <th class="hidden-phone" data-i18n="Task">Task</th>
                <th class="" data-i18n="Power State">Power State</th>
                <th class="hidden-phone actions_column" data-i18n="Actions">Actions</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <%
            var tenants = {};
            var flavorlist = {};
            for (var index in projects.models) {
            var project = projects.models[index];
            tenants[project.id] = project.get("name");
            }
            for (var index in flavors.models) {
            var flavor = flavors.models[index];
            flavorlist[flavor.id] = flavor.get("ram") + " MB RAM | " + flavor.get("vcpus") + " VCPU | " + flavor.get("disk") + "GB Disk";
            }
            var POWER_STATES = {
            0: "NO STATE",
            1: "RUNNING",
            2: "BLOCKED",
            3: "PAUSED",
            4: "SHUTDOWN",
            5: "SHUTOFF",
            6: "CRASHED",
            7: "SUSPENDED",
            8: "FAILED",
            9: "BUILDING"
            };
            for (var index in models) {
            var instance = models[index];
            %>
            <tr  id="instances__row__<%= instance.get('id')%>" class="ajax-update status_down">
                <td class="multi_select_column">
                <input type="checkbox" name="object_ids" id="checkbox_<%= instance.get('id')%>" class="checkbox" value="<%= instance.get('id')%>" />
                </td>
                <td class="hidden-phone"><%= tenants[instance.get("tenant_id")]%></td>
                <td class="hidden-phone"><%= instance.get('OS-EXT-SRV-ATTR:host')%></td>
                <td class=""><a href="#nova/instances_and_volumes/instances/<%=instance.id%>/detail"><%= instance.get('name')%></a></td>
                <td class="hidden-phone">
                <ul>
                    <%
                    if (instance.get("addresses") != null && instance.get("addresses").public != null) {
                    var addresses = instance.get("addresses").public;
                    var i = 0;
                    for (var index in addresses) {
                    i++;
                    var address = addresses[index];
                    %>
                    <li>
                        <%= address.addr %>
                    </li>
                    <% }} %>
                </ul></td>
                <td class="hidden-phone nowrap-col"><%=flavorlist[instance.get("flavor").id]%></td>
                <td class="status_up"><%= instance.get('status')%></td>
                <td class="hidden-phone status_up"><%= instance.get("OS-EXT-STS:task_state") ? instance.get("OS-EXT-STS:task_state") : "None"%></td>
                <td class=""><%= POWER_STATES[instance.get("OS-EXT-STS:power_state")]%></td>
                <td class="hidden-phone actions_column">
                <div id="dropdown_<%= instance.get('id') %>" class="btn-group">

                    <button  id="instances__action_e__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-small btn-edit btn-blue" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Edit Instance">
                        Edit Instance
                    </button>
                    <a class="btn btn-blue btn-small  dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown" href="#"> <span class="caret caret-white"></span> </a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu row_actions clearfix">
                        <%
                        if (instance.get("status") != "ERROR") {
                        if (instance.get("status") != "PAUSED" && instance.get("status") != "SUSPENDED") { %>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <a href="#nova/instances_and_volumes/instances/<%= instance.id %>/detail?view=vnc" id="instances__action_vnc__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-small btn-blue btn-vnc" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" data-i18n="VNC Console">VNC Console</a>
                        </li>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <a href="#nova/instances_and_volumes/instances/<%= instance.id %>/detail?view=log" id="instances__action_log__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-blue btn-log" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="View Log">View Log</a>
                        </li>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_snapshot__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-snapshot" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Snapshot">
                                Snapshot
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_pause__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-pause" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Pause Instance">
                                Pause Instance
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_suspend__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-suspend" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Suspend Instance">
                                Suspend Instance
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_password__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-danger btn-password" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Change Password">
                                Change Password
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_reboot__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-danger btn-reboot" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Reboot Instance">
                                Reboot Instance
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <% } else if (instance.get("status") == "PAUSED") { %>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_unpause__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-unpause" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Unpause Instance">
                                Unpause Instance
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <% } else { %>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_resume__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue btn-small btn-resume" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Resume Instance">
                                Resume Instance
                            </button>
                        </li>
                        <% } %>
                        <% } %>
                        <li class="clearfix">
                            <button  id="instances__action_terminate__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-blue  btn-small btn-danger btn-terminate" name="action" value="<%= instance.id %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Terminate Instance">
                                Terminate Instance
                            </button>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div></td>
            </tr>
            <% } %>
        </tbody>
        <tfoot>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="12"><span  class="blue"><%=UTILS.i18n.pluralise("Displaying %s item", "Displaying %s items", models.length)%></span></td>
                </td>
        </tfoot>
    </table>
</div>
</script>
<script id="servicesTemplate" type="text/html">
<!--
Description: Services
src: templates/root/sys/services.html
-->
<form action="#">
    <div class='table_header'>
        <div class="table_actions clearfix">

            <div class="table_search">
                <input class="inline" value="" type="text" name="services__filter__q" />
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-blue btn-small filter inline-block" data-i18n="Filter">
                    Filter
                </button>
            </div>

        </div>

    </div>

    <table id="services" class="table table-bordered table-striped">
        <thead>
            <tr>

                <th class="hide" data-i18n="Id">Id</th>

                <th class="" data-i18n="Name">Name</th>

                <th class="" data-i18n="Service">Service</th>

                <th class="" data-i18n="Host">Host</th>

                <th class="" data-i18n="Enabled">Enabled</th>

            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <%
            var re = new RegExp('^(?:f|ht)tp(?:s)?\://([^/:]+)', 'im');
            for (var index in models) {
            var service = models[index];
            %>
            <tr id="services__row__0" class="status_up">
                <td class="hide">-</td>
                <td class=""><%= service.get('name')%></td>
                <td class=""><%= service.get('type')%></td>
                <td class=""><%= service.get('endpoints')[0].publicURL.match(re)[1].toString()%></td>
                <td class="status_up" data-i18n="Enabled">Enabled</td>
            </tr>
            <%}%>
        </tbody>
        <tfoot>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="4"><span class="blue"><%=UTILS.i18n.pluralise("Displaying %s item", "Displaying %s items", models.length)%></span></td>
                </td>
        </tfoot>
    </table>

</form>
</script><script id="flavorsTemplate" type="text/html">
<!--
Description: Flavors
src: templates/root/sys/flavors.html
-->
<div id="flavors">
    <div class="table_wrapper">
        <div class='table_header'>
            <div class="table_actions clearfix">
                <a href="#syspanel/flavors/create"  id="flavors__action_create__0" class="btn btn-blue btn-small ajax-modal" data-i18n="Create Flavor">Create Flavor</a>
                <button class='btn  btn-small btn-danger btn-delete-group' name="action" id="flavors_delete" value="flavors__delete" disabled=true type="submit" data-i18n="Delete Flavors">
                    Delete Flavors
                </button>
            </div>
        </div>
        <table id="flavors" class="table table-bordered table-striped">
            <thead>
                <tr>
                    <th class="multi_select_column"></th>
                    <th class="hidden-phone" data-i18n="Id">Id</th>

                    <th class="" data-i18n="Memory">Memory</th>
                    <th class="" data-i18n="Disk">Disk</th>

                    <th class="actions_column hidden-phone" data-i18n="Actions">Actions</th>
                </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody>
                <%
                var i = 0;
                for (var index in models) {
                i++;
                var flavor = models[index];
                %>
                <tr
                id="flavors__row__<%= models.length %>"
                class="ajax-update status_down">
                    <td class="multi_select_column">
                    <input id="checkbox_<%= flavor.get('id')%>" class="checkbox" name="object_ids" value="<%= flavor.get('id') %>" type="checkbox"/>
                    </td>
                    <td class="hidden-phone"><%= flavor.get('id')%></td>
                    <td class=""><%= flavor.get('name')%></td>
                    <td class=""><%= flavor.get('vcpus')%></td>
                    <td class=""><%= flavor.get('ram')%></td>
                    <td class=""><%= flavor.get('disk')%></td>
                    <td class="hidden-phone"><%= flavor.get('OS-FLV-EXT-DATA:ephemeral')%></td>
                    <td class="actions_column hidden-phone">
                    <button id="flavors__action_delete__<%=i%>" class="btn btn-small btn-danger btn-delete" name="action" value="<%= flavor.get('id') %>" type="submit" data-i18n="Delete Flavor">
                        Delete Flavor
                    </button></td>
                </tr>
                <% } %>
            </tbody>
            <tfoot>
                <tr>
                    <td colspan="8"><span class="blue"><%=UTILS.i18n.pluralise("Displaying %s item", "Displaying %s items", models.length)%></span></td>
                    </td>
            </tfoot>
        </table>
    </div>
</div>

                <td class="actions_column hidden-phone">
                <div class="btn-group">

                    <a href='#syspanel/projects/4/update/'  class="ajax-modal btn btn-small btn-blue" data-i18n="Edit Project">Edit Project</a>

                    <ul class="dropdown-menu row_actions clearfix">

                        <li class="clearfix">

                        </li>

                        <li class="clearfix">

                                Delete Project
                            </button>

                        </li>

                    </ul>

                </div></td>
            </tr>
            <% } %>

                </button>

                Delete Users
            </button>

        </div>

    </div>

                </td>
                <td class="">1</td>
                <td class="">admin</td>
                <td class="">None</td>
                <td class="status_up">True</td>
                <td class="actions_column hidden-phone">

</script><script id="rootTemplate" type="text/html">
<!--
Description: Root page. User is already logged in.
src: templates/root/root.html
-->
<div id='topbar' class="topbar"></div>
<div id="container" class="container-fluid row-fluid">

    <div class="span3 sidebar-menu">
        <div id="navtab"></div>

    </div>

    <div id='main_content' class="span9">
        <div id='content'></div>
    </div>
</div>
<hr class="soften clear">
<footer class="footer row-fluid span12">
    <div class="menu pagination-right offset3 span7">
        <p>
            Fi-ware Web Services LLC or its affiliates C 2012. All nights reserved
        </p>
    </div>
    <div class="menu pagination-left offset1 span5">
        <p>
            <a href="#">Site terrms</a>&nbsp;-&nbsp;<a href="#">Privacy Policy</a>
        </p>
    </div>
</footer>

</script><script id="navTabTemplate" type="text/html">
<!--
Description: Navigation Bar
src: templates/root/navTab.html
-->
<section id="navbar">
    <div class="container-fluid">
        <div class="row-fluid">
            <div class="navbar pull-none">
                <div class="navbar-inner color-mv">
                    <div class="container">
                        <a class="btn btn-navbar pull-left" data-toggle="collapse" data-target=".nav-collapse"> <span class="icon-bar"></span> <span class="icon-bar"></span> <span class="icon-bar"></span> </a>
                        <div class="nav-collapse collapse">
                            <ul class="nav">
                                <div id="navtab">

                                    <ul class="nav nav-tabs">
                                        <% for (var index in models) {
                                        var model = models[index];
                                        if (model.get('name') == 'Admin' && showAdmin == false)
                                        continue;
                                        %>
                                        <li <% if (model.get('active')) { %> class="active" <% } %> >
                                            <a href="<%= model.get('url') %>" tabindex='1' data-i18n="<%= model.get('name') %>"><%= model.get('name') %></a>
                                        </li>
                                        <% } %>

                                    </ul>
                                    <div id="sidebar"></div>
             
</script><script id="topBarTemplate" type="text/html">
<!--
Description: Top Bar
src: templates/root/topBar.html
-->

<div id="user_info" class="pull-right">
    <span data-i18n="Logged in as">Logged in as</span>: <%= get('username') %> <a href="#settings/" data-i18n="Settings">Settings</a>
    <a href="#auth/logout" data-i18n="Sign Out">Sign Out</a>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid header span12 hidden-tablet hidden-phone">
    <div class="header span12">
        <div class="logo span4 inline">
            <div class="brand"></div>
            <h2><a href="#home/"><span class="link-logo">Fi-ware</span></a>&nbsp;&nbsp;</h2>
            <h2 class="dashboard"> Dashboard</h2>
        </div>
        <div class="big-tittle inline-block span9 page-header">
            <h2 class="in-big-title" data-i18n="<%= get('title') %>"><%= get('title') %> <% if (has('subtitle')) { %><small><%= get('subtitle') %></small><% } %></h2>
        </div>
        <div class="hidden-desktop">
            <div class="space-double"></div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

</script>
<script id="sideBarTemplate" type="text/html">
<!--
Description: Side Bar
src: templates/root/sideBar.html
-->
<div class="menuv">
    <div id="sideBarTitle" class="gray size20 comfortaa" data-i18n="<%= title %>">
        <%=title%>
    </div>

    <% if (showTenants) { %>
    <div class="tenant_switch">
        <select id="tenant_switcher" tabindex="1" class="inline">
            <option value="">-- Select tenant --</option>
            <% for (var index in loginModel.get("tenants")) {
            var ten = loginModel.get("tenants")[index];
            %>
            <option value="#auth/switch/<%= ten.id%>/" <%
            if (loginModel.get("tenant").name === ten.name) {
            %>selected="selected" <%}%>><%= ten.name%></option>
            <%}%>
        </select>
    </div>
    <% } %>
</div>
<ul class="main_nav">
    <% for (var index in models) {
    var model = models[index];
    %>
    <li>
        <% if (model.get('type') !== 'title') { %>
        <a href="<%= model.get('url') %>" <% if(model.get('active')) { %> class="active" <% } %> tabindex='1' data-i18n="<%= model.get('name') %>"><%= model.get('name') %></a>
        <% } else { %>
        <%= model.get('name') %>
        <% } %>

    </li>
    <% } %>
</ul>
</section>

</script><script id="confirmTemplate" type="text/html">
<div id="confirm" class="modal hide ">
    <!--
    Description: Confirm
    src: templates/root/confirm.html
    -->
    <div class="modal-header">
        <a class="close" id= "close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</a>
        <h3><%= title %></h3>
    </div>
    <div class="modal-body">
        <%= message %>
    </div>
    <div class="modal-footer">
        <a id="confirm_btn" class="btn btn-blue pull-right" data-dismiss="modal"><%= btn_message %></a>
        <a id="cancelBtn" class="btn cancel" data-dismiss="modal">Cancel</a>
    </div>
</div>
</script><script id="settingsTemplate" type="text/html">
<div id="language_settings_modal" class="static_page">
    <!--
    Description: Settings
    src: templates/root/settings.html
    -->
    <div class="modal-header">
        <h3 data-i18n='Select Language'>Select Language</h3>
    </div>
    <div class="modal-body clearfix">
        <div class="left">
            <h3 data-i18n="Dashboard User Interface Language">Dashboard User Interface Language</h3>
            <fieldset>
                <label for="language_select" data-i18n="Language Settings">Language Settings</label>
                <div class="input">
                    <p>
                        <select name="language">
                            <option selected="" value="en">English (en)</option>
                            <option value="es">Español (es)</option>
                            <option value="fr">Français (fr)</option>
                            <option value="mk">Mакедонски (mk)</option>
                        </select>
                    </p>
                </div>
            </fieldset>
        </div>
        <div class="right">
            <h3 data-i18n='Description'>Description</h3>
            <p data-i18n="From here you can modify different settings for your dashboard.">
                From here you can modify different settings for your dashboard.
            </p>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="modal-footer">
        <a id="select" class="btn btn-blue" data-i18n="Select Language">Select Language</a>
    </div>
</div>
</script><script id="messagesTemplate" type="text/html">
	<div class="messages">
<!--
    Description: Messages
    src: templates/messages.html
-->
		<div class="alert alert-block <%= (state == "Success") ? "alert-success" : "alert-error" %> fade in"><p><strong><%= state %>: </strong><%= title %></p></div>
	</div>
</script>
